column2: Uniformize all color scheme hexadecimal colors

column3: With the colorSchemes folder left untouched for the past 6 months and my obsession with consistency, I could no longer deal with the mix of uppercase and lowercase hexadecimal color values.
Thus, I've replaced all lowercase hexadecimal colors to uppercase.
Since the color schemes are very unlikely to be modified anyways, I figured it might as well be properly formatted.
Have you submitted a contributor license agreement? If not, please follow the steps described at http://www.jetbrains.com/agreements/cla/ to sign it.
@dyadix I'd suppose that we need to update https://github.com/JetBrains/colorSchemeTool/blob/master/colorSchemeTool.py#L42 accordingly
@denofevil I already signed the contributor agreement, and good point. I'll do that when I get home.
@denofevil I agree, we should update the conversion tool instead and load the updated schemes.
@dyadix See JetBrains/colorSchemeTool#22, it does just that.
Uniformized all color scheme hexadecimal value attribute
